DOC.brief_summary: This study aim in-depth characterization human milk mother deliver prematurely decipher difference milk mother deliver expected term , particular focus milk protein
DOC.criteria: Having obtain informed consent Group 1 ( term delivery ) : Gestational age 37 0/7 41 6/7 week Group 2 ( preterm delivery ) : Gestational age 28 0/7 32 6/7 week Age : Mother ≥ 18 year old Partial total breast feed Having freezer compartment home ( approx . 18°C ) Good understanding French language Suffering diabetes ( type I II ) pregnancy Alcohol consumption : 1 standard drink / day Drug addict Subject expect comply study procedure . Currently participate interventional therapeutic clinical trial
